title: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Boot Disk ISO InglÃªs
description:
Unique, all in one suite to completely protect, maintain and manage your PC! Every essential solution to manage today hard drives. Full range of backup, recovery and partitioning solutions. Fast migration to new HDDs, SSDs and virtual machines. Efficient disk maintenance and optimization. Windows 8.1 support.

What's new in 14 version:
- Completely new, extremely strong engine for all partitioning tasks
- Complete uEFI Support
- Backup to VD Wizard
- Restore from VD Wizard
- Copy/Restore to Dissimilar Sector Size
- New UIM (Universal Image Mounter)
- GPT/uEFI Compatible Backup Capsule
- Uplifted Recovery Media Builder
- P2P Adjust OS
- uEFI fixup in Linux
- Windows Storage Spaces Support
- Separate x86 and x64 Installation Packages
- Windows 8.1 Support
- New User-friendly Interface
